testcase.name: getConnection

error.message: The TCP/IP connection to the host QASQLQA, port 4096 has failed. Error: "connect timed out. Verify the connection properties. Make sure that an instance of SQL Server is running on the host and accepting TCP/IP connections at the port. Make sure that TCP connections to the port are not blocked by a firewall.".
